pageProduct.name: Pronamel Gentle Whitening Toothpaste 110g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Clinically proven to rebuild enamel strength for strong white teeth.*

*with twice daily brushing

Pronamel Gentle Whitening Enamel Toothpaste is specially formulated to protect teeth against the effects of acid wear*. It contains fluoride and provides all the benefits of a regular toothpaste while gently removing stains to help restore teeth to their natural whiteness.

Acids in everyday food and drinks can soften the protective surface of your tooth (known as enamel), making it more vulnerable to being worn away over time. From the makers of Sensodyne.

*with twice daily brushing

Boxed Contents: Toothpaste 110g

Size: 110g

Warnings

Not for use by children under 12 years of age unless on the advice of a dental professional or doctor

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

PRECAUTIONS

Sensitive teeth may indicate an underlying problem that needs prompt care. If symptoms persist or worsen, see your dentist.

Ingredients

Water, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Glycerin, Potassium Nitrate, PEG-6, Cocamidopropyl Betaine,
Flavour, Titanium Dioxide, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Hydroxide, Limonene.
Contains: Sodium Fluoride 0.315% w/w (1450 ppm fluoride) and Potassium Nitrate 5% w/w.
This product does not contain SLS (Sodium Lauryl Sulfate).

Active Ingredients: Sodium Fluoride 0.315% w/w (1450 ppm fluoride) and Potassium Nitrate 5% w/w

Contains: Contains: Sodium Fluoride 0.315% w/w (1450 ppm fluoride) and Potassium Nitrate 5% w/w

Directions

Brush twice a day and no more than three times.

USAGE ADVICE

Do not swallow, and spit out.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

If irritation occurs, discontinue use.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store at controlled room temperature 20-25°C.

Storage Temperature: Between 20-25°C.
